narrative.narrative: AB Aviation is an airline based at Moroni,Comoros. Comoros is the island nation in the Indian Ocean between mainland Africa and Madagascar. It began in 2013 and has two Embraer 120's and a 737. It goes to the other two domestic airports at Anjouan and Moheli and international to Pemba,Mozambique Dar es Salam,Tanzania Antananarivo,Madagascar Majunga,Madagascar and the French island territory of Mayotte nearby. It has flights between all 3 domestic airports, while Mayotte is served from Anjouan and Moheli. The mainland Africa and Madagascar flights are from the hub at Moroni.
